messages.title: Adobe India Women In Tech Scholarship
messages.formattedText: At Adobe, we’re focused on bringing together the smartest, most driven, diverse set of individuals and give them the freedom to nurture their intellectual curiosity. We provide them with the necessary resources and support to shape their ideas into tangible results.

messages.speech:
THE SCHOLARSHIP WILL COVER:

Fund toward tuition fees for the remainder of the award recipient’s university education ending in academic year 2019-20.
Also, you will get an opportunity for Summer Internship at Adobe India in 2019.
You will also be given mentoring by a senior technology leader from Adobe.
You may also travel to Grace Hopper Conference India, with the participation fee covered.
The link to the Adobe India scholarship website is provided below.
Is there anything else that you would like to know about?
